qas.question: Do i need a pcr before arrival in oman?

answers.text: Foreign nationals arriving in Oman must: present a certificate with QR code confirming a negative PCR test result

qas.question: What happens if i have a positive pcr result before travel to oman?

answers.text: If you have recovered from COVID-19 and have a positive PCR test result, you will be required to show proof that you have completed the required isolation period in the country you have travelled from

paragraphs.context: If you are unsure if you meet the requirements (or consider you have exceptional circumstances) to enter Oman please speak to your nearest Oman Embassy and/or your sponsor in Oman. Foreign nationals arriving in Oman must: present a certificate with QR code confirming a negative PCR test result (this test must be taken no more than 72 hours before arrival in Oman. If you have recovered from COVID-19 and have a positive PCR test result, you will be required to show proof that you have completed the required isolation period in the country you have travelled from
